title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: December 14, 2022, 10:05:06 AMLast edit: December 18, 2022, 10:09:34 AM by julerz12
content: [EDIT]12/18/222Spice Bounty Campaign will be closed. The project team has problems with their token contract and cannot proceed with the bounty campaign.The official announcement can be found here: https://t.me/spice_channe/31564I suggest stopping all bounty activities regarding 2Spice. All current signature campaign participants are welcome to transfer to the other campaign under my management with a signature campaign category.Again, this decision came directly from the dev team. Not mine......[ WEBSITE ]....[ TWITTER ]....[ WHITEPAPER ]....[ DISCORD ]....[ TELEGRAM ]....[ WHITELIST ].....Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.
